#Spring

##springMVC TEST ###DELETE 如果出现该错误，请查看@RequestMapping(value = "/delete/" 要写成如下，如果是根据ID删除 @RequestMapping(value = "/delete/{id}" 否则报如下错误:HTTP-405 Request method 'DELETE' not supported
